name: Fortress Church
tagline: One Vision • Twelve Leaders • Generations Reached
welcomeMessage: Fortress Church is a G12 house committed to winning souls, consolidating families, discipling leaders, and sending every believer to impact the nations. No matter where you are on your journey, there is a place for you in the Government of Twelve.
mission: To raise multiplying disciples through the G12 Vision—encountering Jesus, consolidating new believers, discipling with intention, and sending out teams that transform cities.

address.street: Sta. Rosa Town Center - SRTC National Road, Brgy. Macabling

g12Vision.description: We embrace the Government of Twelve as our blueprint for the Great Commission. Every believer is pastored through a cell, equipped through the School of Leaders, and released to lead their own twelve.

pillars.title: Encounter Retreats
pillars.summary: Two-day weekends where people experience the cross, deliverance, and the Holy Spirit.

pillars.title: Consolidation Journey
pillars.summary: Forty-day follow up with devotionals, coaching calls, and mentorship to strengthen new believers.

pillars.title: School of Leaders
pillars.summary: A three-level training track that shapes character, doctrine, and leadership skills for cell leaders.

pillars.title: Government of Twelve
pillars.summary: Each leader disciples twelve, who disciple twelve, multiplying care and mission across generations.

buildingProject.name: New Sanctuary Building
buildingProject.description: We have moved into our new sanctuary! This new space accommodates our growing congregation and better serves our community. This project represents our commitment to faith, fellowship, and future generations.
